data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Río Negro a passion to plant another simple church.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Río Negro, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Río Negro, Uruguay.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Río Negro to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, help the 3,998 believers in Río Negro to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Colonia Elía
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Colonia Elía, Río Negro, Uruguay.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Río Negro, Uruguay. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Río Negro, Uruguay.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.section_summary:
the state of Río Negro, Uruguay has a population of 54,800.

We estimate Río Negro has 3,998 people who might know Jesus, 32,458 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 18,344 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Río Negro, Uruguay.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."
